protocol_core.protocol_name: FACS sorting to enrich for NK cells for SS2
protocol_core.protocol_description: FACS was used with gates CD45+HLA-DR−CD3−CD56−CD94− ; CD45+HLA-DR−CD3−CD56+CD94−; autofluorescence; CD45+HLA-DR−CD3−CD56+CD94+CD9−; CD45+HLA-DR−CD3−CD56+CD94+CD9+

markers: CD45+ HLA-DR− CD3− CD56− CD94− CD56+ CD94− CD94+ CD9− CD9+
